name: Luciditi
tagline: Improving bedtime routines to unlock our greatest potentials
body:
### Unlock Your Potential
Imagine a perfect Monday morning, notice the feeling of what 8 hours of sleep contributed: alertness, excitement, feeling recharged, and ready to thrive.
Sleep will become the cousin of life.

### Track Progress
Use our sensors and REM eyelid tracking to track and improve progress over time.

### Log Hours

### Compare Sleep and Mood
With a post dream journal check in,
